BRP.agingImpact: Choose the effects of character aging
BRP.alreadyheal: This wound has already been healed with Sorcery
BRP.alreadytreat: This wound has already been treated or natural healing has occurred
BRP.baseScoreHint: Select 'Fixed' for no rule in the relevant characterstic and multiple
BRP.baseFormulaHint: This formula is used to roll characteristics in a normal power game
BRP.culturalAdjHint: Modifiers are applied automatically if the game settings is activated
BRP.daily: Number in parenthesis is the damage taken today
BRP.dropHitLocs: Drag and drop hit location items here
BRP.dupCulture: Can not add a second culture, please delete the first one and try again
BRP.dupItem-2: as the character already has it
BRP.dupPers: Can not add a second personality, please delete the first one and try again
BRP.dupProf: Can not add a second profession, please delete the first one and try again
BRP.dupSpecies: Can not add a second species, please delete the first one and try again
BRP.enhancedFormulaHint: This formula is used to roll characteristics in a game at Heroic power level or above
BRP.fixedStatHint: These are the starting characteristics when the points allocation option is used
BRP.flatModHint: Enter a beneficial modifer as a postive number
BRP.healedHint: This wound can be healed by Sorcery
BRP.hitLocFractionHint: Enter 3 for 1/3, 4 for 1/4, 5 for 1/5 and 2.5 for 2/5
BRP.hitLocRollHint: Range on D20 roll for this hit location
BRP.initialiseHint: Character is in Creation mode - you will be able to edit it
BRP.keyHint: Keywords are used to allow coding of impacts of the skill/item etc
BRP.locTypeHint: Body locations result in death if there's 3 times the max HP, otherwise it's a limb and is severed in these circumstances
BRP.maxStatHint: This is the normal maximum stat on character creation
BRP.minorWound: You have exceeded your daily damage and must make a Luck Roll
BRP.minStatHint: This is the normal minimum stat on character creation
BRP.name: Name
BRP.nameSpecialism: Please enter the name of specialism
BRP.noCulture: Please add a culture before proceeding further
BRP.noImprove: is not flagged for an XP improvement check
BRP.noPers: Pesonality options are not allowed - this is controlled from the BRP game settings
BRP.notAged: You did not select enough aging effects, these have been spread across STR, CON, DEX and CHA in that order
BRP.notInitialise: Character is not in Creation mode
BRP.noXPHint: Successfully using this skill does not grant an XP check
BRP.pointsHint: Characteristic points pool if using the Points method to create a character
BRP.redistDec: You may only reduce characteristics by a total of 3 points
BRP.redistInc: You may only increase characteristics by a total of 3 points
BRP.skillSubTotal: Skill sub-total for maximum starting skill
BRP.specGroupDrop: You may not add a Skill Group directly to a character sheet
BRP.specGroupHint: When used via an Optional Skill Group in a Profession or Personality this will let you select one of all skills in the Skill Category
BRP.specialismHint: There are specialism of this skill - change the skill name to reflect the specialism
BRP.statCap: You may not exceed the cultural max/min for this characteristic
BRP.stopHitLoc: Hit Locations may not be added directly to a character - they are added as part of the Species selection
BRP.treatAmount: Enter amount of damage healed on
BRP.treatedHint: This wound can be treated with First Aid or Medicine
BRP.usedStatPoints: You do not have enough unused character points
BRP.variableHint: Toggle this on to choose rules that determine base skill chance
BRP.weaponHint: This item is displayed under weapons rather than combat skill
BRP.woundHint: Asterisk means a wound can still be treated, bold means the wound can still receive Sorcery healing

BRP.cm.hint: Left click to make a roll.  Shift Left click to make an Average Roll.  Right click for more options

BRP.powerLevel.label: Power Level of Game
BRP.powerLevel.hint: This determines starting characteristics, skills, XP gain etc

BRP.skillBonus.label: Skill Category Bonus Method
BRP.skillBonus.hint: Select no bonus, simple (prime characteristic) calc or advanced method

BRP.Settings.backgroundHint: Title of this character background section
BRP.Settings.enhancedPSPHint: PSP are determined by the game Power Level rather than INT * 10
BRP.Settings.healModHint: Naturual Healing is per location rather than per character
BRP.Settings.ignoreAgeHint: Ignore age effects on skills and characteristics
BRP.Settings.pointsMethodHint: Characteristics determined with points, not dice
BRP.Settings.useEDUHint: Characters will have an EDU characteristic
BRP.Settings.useSANHint: Characters will have a SAN score
BRP.Settings.useFPHint: Characters will have a Fatigue Points score
BRP.Settings.useMPHint: Power Points will be called Magic Points
BRP.Settings.useHPLHint: Tick this to use Hits Per Location
BRP.Settings.usePersHint: This controls whether personalities can be added to a character
BRP.Settings.xpFixed: Fixed value for an XP gain
BRP.Settings.xpFormula: Dice to roll for an XP gain
